Package org.codehaus.groovy.grails.plugins.searchable.compass.config.mapping

Interface Summary
SearchableGrailsDomainClassMappingConfigurator Configures Compass with a searchable domain class mapping
 

Class Summary
AbstractSimpleSearchableGrailsDomainClassMappingConfigurator  
CompassAnnotationSearchableGrailsDomainClassMappingConfigurator Configures Compass with searchable domain classes that are annotated with Compass's native @Searchable annotations.
CompassMappingXmlSearchableGrailsDomainClassMappingConfigurator Configures Compass with searchable domain classes that have a corresponding Compass mapping XML classpath resource.
SearchableClassPropertySearchableGrailsDomainClassMappingConfigurator Configures Compass with searchable domain classes according to a "searchable" class property value
SearchableGrailsDomainClassMappingConfiguratorFactory
